verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: just in adamawa] [ARG0: police commissioner withdraws politicians’ bodyguards until general election at a press briefing in his office in yola on monday cp abdullahi] [V: said] [ARG1: the decision was necessitated by acute shortage of manpower commissioner general election inec africa election sahara reporters abdullahi yerima ibrahim independent national electoral commission]

just in adamawa police commissioner withdraws politicians’ bodyguards until general election at a press briefing in his office in yola on monday cp abdullahi said the decision [V: was] necessitated by acute shortage of manpower commissioner general election inec africa election sahara reporters abdullahi yerima ibrahim independent national electoral commission

just in adamawa police commissioner withdraws politicians’ bodyguards until general election at a press briefing in his office in yola on monday cp abdullahi said [ARG1: the decision] was [V: necessitated] [ARG0: by acute shortage of manpower commissioner general election inec africa election] sahara reporters abdullahi yerima ibrahim independent national electoral commission
